document.full_text: india's most famous yoga guru began a mass fast to the death on saturday to demand reforms including the death penalty for corrupt officials in an anti-graft campaign that has undermined an embattled and scandal-tainted prime minister manmohan singh.
document.title: indian anti-graft yoga guru begins fast to death
lines_and_colors: india's most famous yoga guru began a mass fast to the death on saturday to demand reforms including the death penalty for corrupt officials in an anti-graft campaign that has undermined an embattled and scandal-tainted prime minister manmohan singh.
